about_the_game:
The hottest new label of sporty apparel has launched to great excitement on Craftworld.
Grab loads of new gear from skater shirts to faded jeans, adding cool new trainers, beanies, and more to your wardrobe in Sackboy™: A Big Adventure. Internet connection required to access downloadable content.
detailed_description:
The hottest new label of sporty apparel has launched to great excitement on Craftworld.
Grab loads of new gear from skater shirts to faded jeans, adding cool new trainers, beanies, and more to your wardrobe in Sackboy™: A Big Adventure. Internet connection required to access downloadable content.
legal_notice: ©2022 Sony Interactive Entertainment Europe. Developed by Sumo Digital. "Sackboy" is a trademark or registered trademark of Sony Interactive Entertainment Europe. "Playstation Family Mark" and Playstation Studios logo" are registered trademarks or trademarks of Sony Interactive Entertainment Inc.
name: Sackboy™: A Big Adventure - Sporty Clothing Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit (version 1809)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400 @ 2.7GHz, AMD FX-6300 @ 3.5GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660, AMD Radeon R7 265
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 60 GB HDD (SSD Recommended)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit (version 1809)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770K @ 3.5GHz AMD Ryzen 5 1500X @ 3.5GHz
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX580
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 60 GB HDD (SSD Recommended)

short_description: The hottest new label of sporty apparel has launched to great excitement on Craftworld. Grab loads of new gear from skater shirts to faded jeans, adding cool new trainers, beanies, and more to your wardrobe in Sackboy™: A Big Adventure. Internet connection required to access downloadable content.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Czech, Danish*, Dutch*, Finnish*, Greek*, Hungarian, Japanese*, Korean, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Romanian*, Russian*, Spanish - Latin America*, Swedish*, Traditional Chinese, Turkish*
*languages with full audio support
